agent_utterance:
Non-perishable, travel-friendly snack ideas you can rotate, plus quick night-time strategies for tired or stressed evenings:
- Trail mix (nuts, seeds, dried fruit) in single-serve bags
- Beef, turkey, or chicken jerky sticks
- Shelf-stable cheese snacks or cheese crisps
- Tuna or chicken pouches (in water or oil)
- Protein or granola bars with lower added sugar
- Roasted chickpeas or soy nuts
- Peanut or almond butter packets with whole-grain crackers or rice cakes
- Ready-to-eat lentil or bean-based snack packs

Night-time/tired-or-stressed tips:
- Keep a portable protein option and water within reach; a warm caffeine-free tea can help settle down
- Try a 5–10 minute wind-down: light stretching, box breathing (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 6)
- Brush teeth after dinner and dim lights to cue sleep
- If urges strike, delay 10 minutes and switch to a quick non-food activity (brief reading, puzzle, tidy a small area)
- Prep a simple next-day micro-goal to reduce decision fatigue
